Class# MTRDeviceAttestationDeviceInfo

iOS 16.1+iPadOS 16.1+Mac Catalyst 16.1+macOS 13.0+tvOS 16.1+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 9.1+

```
class MTRDeviceAttestationDeviceInfo
```

## [Topics](/documentation/Matter/MTRDeviceAttestationDeviceInfo#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/Matter/MTRDeviceAttestationDeviceInfo#Instance-Properties)

[`var basicInformationProductID: NSNumber`](/documentation/matter/mtrdeviceattestationdeviceinfo/basicinformationproductid)[`var basicInformationVendorID: NSNumber`](/documentation/matter/mtrdeviceattestationdeviceinfo/basicinformationvendorid)[`var certificateDeclaration: Data?`](/documentation/matter/mtrdeviceattestationdeviceinfo/certificatedeclaration)Deprecated[`var dacCertificate: Data`](/documentation/matter/mtrdeviceattestationdeviceinfo/daccertificate)[`var dacPAICertificate: Data`](/documentation/matter/mtrdeviceattestationdeviceinfo/dacpaicertificate)[`var productID: NSNumber?`](/documentation/matter/mtrdeviceattestationdeviceinfo/productid)[`var vendorID: NSNumber?`](/documentation/matter/mtrdeviceattestationdeviceinfo/vendorid)[`var attestationChallenge: Data`](/documentation/matter/mtrdeviceattestationdeviceinfo/attestationchallenge)The attestation challenge from the secure session.[`var attestationNonce: Data`](/documentation/matter/mtrdeviceattestationdeviceinfo/attestationnonce)The attestation nonce from the AttestationRequest command.[`var certificationDeclaration: Data?`](/documentation/matter/mtrdeviceattestationdeviceinfo/certificationdeclaration)The certification declaration of the device, if available. This is a DER-encoded string representing a CMS-formatted certification declaration. May be nil only if attestation verification failed.[`var elementsSignature: Data`](/documentation/matter/mtrdeviceattestationdeviceinfo/elementssignature)A signature, using the device attestation private key of the device that sent the attestation information, over the concatenation of elementsTLV and attestationChallenge.[`var elementsTLV: Data`](/documentation/matter/mtrdeviceattestationdeviceinfo/elementstlv)The TLV-encoded attestation_elements_message that was used to find the certificationDeclaration (possibly unsuccessfully).## [Relationships](/documentation/Matter/MTRDeviceAttestationDeviceInfo#relationships)
